Description: Curated Sigma rules relevant to APT41 / Arisen-from-Dust campaign.

Rules.Name: APT41 DUST DLL Sideloading Activity
Rules.Description:
Detects DLL sideloading of trojanized DLLs used in APT41 DUST campaign, where legit binaries are abused to load malicious DLLs

Author: D3xM0n
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Rules.Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path = 'c:\program files\ahnlab\v3lite\ahnuninst.exe' and (image_loaded like '%\sbiedll.dll' or image_loaded like '%\dbgeng.dll' or image_loaded like '%\atstrust.dll' or image_loaded like '%\hostfxr.dll')

Rules.Name: Rar Usage with Password and Compression Level
Rules.Description:
Detects the use of rar.exe, on the command line, to create an archive with password protection or with a specific compression level. This is pretty indicative of malicious actions.

Author: @ROxPinTeddy
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Rules.Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '% -hp%' and (command like '% -m%' or command like '% a %'))

Rules.Name: Suspicious File Downloaded From Direct IP Via Certutil.EXE
Rules.Description:
Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from direct IPs.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Rules.Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%urlcache %' or command like '%verifyctl %') and (command like '%://1%' or command like '%://2%' or command like '%://3%' or command like '%://4%' or command like '%://5%' or command like '%://6%' or command like '%://7%' or command like '%://8%' or command like '%://9%') and (process_path like '%\certutil.exe' and original_file_name = 'certutil.exe')) and  not command like '%://7-%')
